verses.verse: Oh come, <S%H3212><s%> let <S%H7442><s%>'s sing to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Let <S%H7321><s%>'s shout aloud to the rock <S%H6697><s%> of our salvation! <S%H3468><s%>
Let <S%H6923><s%>'s come before his presence <S%H6440><s%> with thanksgiving. <S%H8426><s%> Let <S%H7321><s%>'s extol him with songs! <S%H2158><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is a great <S%H1419><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> above all gods. <S%H410><s%>
In his hand <S%H3027><s%> are the deep places <S%H4278><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> The heights <S%H8443><s%> of the mountains are also his. <S%H2022><s%>
The sea <S%H3220><s%> is his, <S%H6213><s%> and he made it. <S%H3027><s%> His hands formed <S%H3335><s%> the dry land. <S%H3006><s%>
Oh come, <S%H935><s%> let <S%H7812><s%>'s worship and bow down. <S%H3766><s%> Let <S%H1288><s%>'s kneel before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> our Maker, <S%H6213><s%>

for he is our God. <S%H430><s%> We are the people <S%H5971><s%> of his pasture, <S%H4830><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> in his care. <S%H3027><s%> Today, <S%H3117><s%> oh that you would hear <S%H8085><s%> his voice! <S%H6963><s%>
Don't <S%H7185><s%> harden your heart, <S%H3824><s%> as at Meribah, <S%H4808><s%> as in the day <S%H3117><s%> of Massah <S%H4531><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%>
when your fathers <S%H1><s%> tempted <S%H5254><s%> me, <S%H974><s%> tested me, <S%H7200><s%> and saw my work. <S%H6467><s%>

Forty <S%H705><s%> long years <S%H8141><s%> I was grieved <S%H6962><s%> with that generation, <S%H1755><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "It is a people <S%H5971><s%> that errs <S%H8582><s%> in their heart. <S%H3824><s%> They have not known <S%H3045><s%> my ways. <S%H1870><s%>"
Therefore I swore <S%H7650><s%> in my wrath, <S%H639><s%> "They won't <S%H935><s%> enter into my rest. <S%H4496><s%>"
